message: Bob, I'm offering you the product for $900,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you.  Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, while I appreciate your offer, I can't go that low.  I'm willing to meet you halfway at $825,000.  This still leaves room for a fair profit for both of us. Let's make this deal.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $775,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
